title: Girl accidentally shot by brother
content:
COMANCHE, Okla._A 10-year-old girl is at OU Medical Center with life threatening injuries after her brother accidentally shot her.
It happened around 8:00 p.m. Tuesday about three miles south of Comanche off Highway 81. According to the Stephens County sheriff, the girl's 12-year-old brother was unloading a rifle outdoors when deputies say he accidentally shot his sister in the neck.
You can count on 7News to keep you updated.
